response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its value to you, I propose a price of $12,000 for this exceptional item. This offer reflects a strategic midpoint between its intrinsic worth of $15,000 to me and its perceived value of $8,000 to you. I believe this price is fair and mutually beneficial, providing you with an opportunity to acquire a high-quality product at a reasonable cost. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 12000}
